Happy Birthday, Mommy!

is it appropriate to include your age in this post?

Posted by Tali M. on August 4, 2015

I think it is. 45 o cumplea√±os feliz a mi madre. You're still young enough to have a 9th baby!!!



You found this bru and made all of us.

You

+

=

Let's move on. I really don't want to get into those details.

I know I scream at you sometimes, but as I age I realize how stupid that is of me.

You almost always make the loveliest impressions on everyone (the only exception that comes to mind is your screaming at Acey- that little square face!- in front of Frank), including Gloria Hack, Marlee, Brooke, Judd/Denise (I said impression, not lasting impression), and everyone else who meets you.

A birthday greeting for you:

Dearest Mother,
I know I do not showcase how much I appreciate you nearly as much as I should.
Some reasons why you are great (just a few of the many!):
1. You have 184 windows in your house.

2. You reacted wonderfully to having a bat in our house but no heroic husband when my friend Jessie from Capital Camps trekked over to Baltimore to visit me.
3. You are thee most fit mother of 8 on the planet.
4. You are the most hardworking, dedicated bar/bat-mitzvah planner when it comes to your children. I'll always treasure my Voge magazine.

Thank you for prioritizing all of your wonderful kids before yourself (in all regards but exercising and responding to emails). We love you and think you are the very best!

A special shoutout to Grandma for her birthday, too!

T-3 days till we can reunite
